name: Meteor Destroyer
description:
Traveling through space can be a wild ride! Luckily your ship is armed with a powerful lazer! While traveling through space you ran into a field of meteors and alien ships! Destroy them all for a good score.

Art assets not by me:

  • Spaceship
  • space skybox
  • rocks
  • original midi for music
  • xbox 360 controller image

Made in Unity.
